main event: One observer reported seeing a round, yellow object the size of a pea at arm's length, flying in level flight heading west.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for two minutes., The observer described the object as round and yellow in color., The object was estimated to be the size of a pea held at arm's length., The conclusion suggested the sighting could be caused by an aircraft., The observation took place on 16 May 1956 in Palm Desert, California.
